snippet: Guest blogger Lisa Shannon writes about the key point of the Kony 2012 viral video: to advocate the immediate capture and delivery of Joseph Kony to the International Criminal Court.
abstract: Guest blogger Lisa Shannon writes about the key point of the Kony 2012 viral video: to advocate the immediate capture and delivery of Joseph Kony to the International Criminal Court.

headline.main: Kony's Victims and the Kony 2012 Video
